Items.text: Looking to be the next sidekick for a local superhero?
Items.name: Nimbus

Items.text: Want to build your resume with an internship in the superhero industry?
Items.name: Nimbus

Items.text: Then Hero Club is the place for you!
Items.name: Nimbus

Items.text: Come and see how you can become the next household name of Garnet City!
Items.name: Nimbus

Items.text: You have successfully signed up for Hero Club!
